author: pieterdavid
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33960 for SiStripQualityStatistics and SiStripBadComponentInfo, and makes reading the bad components from FED errors from a legacy DQM file work again (this stopped working at some point, and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27565 did not cover this case - the common case, which is used in the DQM sequence and covered by matrix tests, is reading from the DQM store, that has always been working correctly). Reading from a file is only used locally from time to time to produce a payload.

#### PR validation:

The produced bad component payload, with the FED errors source included from a file, is identical to the one produced with a 10_1_X release, and that is added as a new unit test. This tests uses a DQM file from EOS, I added a check to skip the tests in case that is not found, is that a reasonable solution? Matrix tests run without errors, no changes in the comparisons are expected.

CC: @kmondal @mmusich @robervalwalsh
title: Fix SiStripQuality merging with FED errors from a DQM file
